price: Ati mtu anakipata kila anacho kitamani?
footnotes: Mwanaadamu hapati kila anacho kitamani, ya kupata uombezi wa haya masanamu au mengineyo anayo yatamani kwa nafsi yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
